eo-markdown-editor.doc:
markdown 编辑器

## Examples

### Basic

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-markdown-editor
  properties:
    value: |-
      # Markdown

      > Content.

      ![image.png](data:image/png;base64,)
  events:
    markdown.value.change:
      action: console.log
      args:
        - change
        - <% EVENT.detail %>
    image.upload:
      action: console.log
      args:
        - upload
        - <% EVENT.detail %>
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-markdown-editor
#   value="# Markdown
# 
# > Content.
# 
# ![image.png](data:image/png;base64,)"
#   id="brick-1"
# ></eo-markdown-editor>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.addEventListener("markdown.value.change", (e) => {
#     console.log("change", e.detail);
#   });
#   brick_1.addEventListener("image.upload", (e) => {
#     console.log("upload", e.detail);
#   });
# </script>
# 
```

### Table

```yaml preview
- brick: eo-markdown-editor
  properties:
    value: |-
      # Markdown

      > Content.

      | head1 | head2 | head3 |
      | :---- | :---- | :---- |
      | 1     | 3     | 5     |
      | 2     | 4     | 6     |
  events:
    markdown.value.change:
      action: console.log
      args:
        - change
        - <% EVENT.detail %>
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-markdown-editor
#   value="# Markdown
# 
# > Content.
# 
# | head1 | head2 | head3 |
# | :---- | :---- | :---- |
# | 1     | 3     | 5     |
# | 2     | 4     | 6     |"
#   id="brick-1"
# ></eo-markdown-editor>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.addEventListener("markdown.value.change", (e) => {
#     console.log("change", e.detail);
#   });
# </script>
# 
```

### CodeBlock

````yaml preview
- brick: eo-markdown-editor
  properties:
    value: |-
      # Markdown

      > Content.

      ```css
        .table-tooltip-btn-box:hover {
          background-color: #e8e8e8;
        }
      ```
  events:
    markdown.value.change:
      action: console.log
      args:
        - change
        - <% EVENT.detail %>
# -- YAML DELIMITER (1nbbm8) --
# <eo-markdown-editor
#   value="# Markdown
# 
# > Content.
# 
# ```css
#   .table-tooltip-btn-box:hover {
#     background-color: #e8e8e8;
#   }
# ```"
#   id="brick-1"
# ></eo-markdown-editor>
# 
# <script>
#   const brick_1 = document.getElementById("brick-1");
#   brick_1.addEventListener("markdown.value.change", (e) => {
#     console.log("change", e.detail);
#   });
# </script>
# 
````
